column5: Hey everyone,  As some of you know, I recently held a contest to help promote my guiding business, and to spread some Christmas cheer.  The draw has come and I would like to congratulate the winners of this years contest, if all goes well, I may hold another one next season!  Draw #1 - Lake Trout/Whitefish Trip  The winner is .... Fisherpete  Draw #2 - Perch Trip  The winner is ... Dobee  Draw #3 - Bass Trip  The winner is ... Mike The Bass Fisher   Congratulations to all the winners, get in touch with me via PM or email and we can find a suitable date that works for us.  Looking forward to it!
I'm sure you just made a young man's christmas there Steve!
My fiancee drew the names, and I laughed when that one came out.
Yep Mike is having a good year, that's for sure!
You should be paying Mike the Bass Fisher to take you out ! He's a legend round here........dont cha know !!!!!
WOOO HOOOOOOO !!!!!!!!!   sTEVE,,, Mike is gonna kick yer butt!   I think we should have some kind of contest on this outing..... and all proceeds go to the winners favorite charity.
After the trip with Mike we gotta revoke his thread making abilities for a week until he calms down  :)
Yepppp///   Mike is gonna be so pumped !   woooohoooooo

WOW, I'm speechless Steve. I got a PM this morning from a friend of mine saying to check out OFC....wasn't sure why. Then another a few minutes ago   I am very excited to get out with a Pro and do some quality bass fishing, largemouth's maybe??  Thank you Soooo Much Steve, a early Birthday present in my eye's sir!   Can't Wait!!  MTBF

WTG  Mike!!!!   we expect BIG fish from you bro.....  Maybe you will teach him a thing or two...   how about a pool to see who catches the most weight and the proceeds go to the charity of the winners choice?  are u up for it Mike?
Steve , hats off to you for doing what you did.Very nice of you.  As for the side bet stuff,my money is on Steve.
I never think about competition while standing beside a angler..   Steve is a remarkable angler and hopefully I'll learn a few things from him on this trip
Maybe we can borrow Ryan from FOF for a few hours to film for this trip?  HEHEHE  Congrats to all and good on ya Steve!
I got 50 on the kid from Lindsay
nevermind the poll guess which one is from lindsay
Lol, I'm sure the guy from Lindsay will win  Caught that comment right away
Congrats Mike.  Time to get that new PB smallie.  Steve will put you on them for sure.  He knows his bass fishing for sure! Congrats to all.
